channel.title: Help making a total level item thing

item.title: Help making a total level item thing
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Method to acquire the players total level;

public int totalLevel() { int total = 0; for (int i : playerLevel) { total += i; } return total; }

In the method where the player is leveling up, instead of placing it in the switch statement, simply add this after it;

if ((totalLevel() + 1) == 2277) { frames.sendMsg("@red@Well done! You've achieved the highest possible total level."); }

These are just examples, you will have to make it work for own source.

Read full topic
item.source: Help making a total level item thing

item.title: Help making a total level item thing
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Alright, on most servers when you reach a 99 in any level you get the skill cape. I want to do kind of the same thing, except when you reach a total level of 2277, i want it to give something. Does anyone know how to do this? This is what I have so far, but it isn’t working.

[code=javascript] case 25: // Total
// sendFrame164(4267);
sendMessage(
“Congratulations you acheived the highest total level possible!”);
// NpcDialogueSend = true;
if (totalz >= 2277) {
addItem(76, 1);
addItem(76, 1);
addItem(76, 1);
addItem(13666, 1);
addItem(3107, 1);
sendMessage(
“Congratulations, you just recived some amazing items, and the best boots in the game!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten "
+ playerLevel[1] + " in everything!!!");
}
break;

    }
}[/code]

I’m like 60% sure it’s totalz, if theres a way I can change it though to totalLevel could you tell me?
I found this, but I don’t even know if it has anything to do with what I’m talking about.

sendMessage("Total lvl: " + totalz); sendMessage("UserName: " + playerName); sendMessage("Password: " + playerPass); sendMessage("UserID: " + playerId); sendMessage("Rights: " + playerRights); sendMessage("Location X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY);
For the first line Total lvl does that meen it would be said as totalz?

Read full topic
item.source: Help making a total level item thing
